page.title: 05EDUCATION IN CANFORD MAGNA.
page.content: {MERLEY 1st.SCHOOL}is in the centre of a large housing estate.There is a tea- ching staff of l6 inc.the headmaster;& 448 boys & girls in the 5-9 age range. There are l2 ancillary workers,inc.the Sec. & 9 dinner ladies,who supervise the children at lunchtimes.Children take packed lunches for their mid-day meal.The school hours are from 9 a.m.- 3.30 p.m.with a break of l5 mins. mid- morning and afternoon,plus lunch-hour. A school crossing-lady is employed,and a groundsman to keep the grounds tidy. The school is cleaned by a caretaker who lives in a house on the site 4 part-time cleaners.As the name sugg- ests,the school is the first step in the state education system.When the children leave,they go to Broadstone Middle or Allenbourne Middle School in Wimborne.
